content: happy handy hammock a storage hammock for all your wall hanging needs yarn any dk weight hook 5mm time 2hrs make this with any leftover wool you have hanging around and store everything from wool to fruit to plushies and more abbreviations chain chain double_crochet double_crochet dtr treble_crochet sst slip_stitch please be aware that these are english crochet terms for american crafters dtr treble double_crochet single_crochet start chain 60 place marker chain 6 dtr into marked stitch remove marker chain 2 skip 2 dtr into next stitch repeat to end of chain chain 4 place marker chain 2 turn repeat above until you reach the chain of the previous row dtr into marked stitch continue as set until desired length reached handles loosely chain 30 sts from corner sst into marked stitch from final row ch1 turn sst into every chain fasten and repeat at the other end of the hammock finishing touches weave in all ends and if desired to pull the sides of the hammock close together tie an overhand knot at the base of the handles happy hammocking © 2020 katherine armstrong personal use only
